meanings.definition: The legs of a person or animal that are located in the middle of the body.
meanings.sent1: She admired the graceful midlegs of the horse as it trotted around the field.
meanings.sent2: The spider has eight legs, with the midlegs being slightly longer than the others.
meanings.sent3: The midlegs of the table seemed to have a mind of their own, wobbling whenever someone walked by.
meanings.sent4: Her midlegs carried her swiftly through the forest, like a gazelle fleeing from a predator.
meanings.sent5: The midlegs of the chair creaked under the weight of the heavy bookshelf placed on top.

meanings.definition: To have legs that are of medium length.
meanings.sent1: He midlegs his way through the obstacle course, neither too fast nor too slow.
meanings.sent2: The cat midlegs around the garden, gracefully navigating the flower beds.
meanings.sent3: The robot midlegs across the room, its movements precise and calculated.
meanings.sent4: She midlegs her way through the crowd, trying to reach the front of the line.
meanings.sent5: The dancer midlegs across the stage, showcasing her elegant footwork.
